message:
Hello,
I want to learn something about particle animations, heightmaps, ...
I use Tkinter atm, but when I want to draw a 500x500 pixel picture , it is too slow...
Is there a fast library for python, to draw such many pixels with a relative "high" framerate?
not sure if it would work for you, but have you looked at PIL at all?
oh sorry, just saw the bits about it being animated
@Samuirai Take a look at pyGame (http://pygame.org) or pyglet (http://www.pyglet.org)?
i need to learn to read
